title: Rp troubles
body: i have 38 rp and if i buy 650 rp ill be 9RP off my special for project lucian which is 697  is there any way you guys could give me the tiny bit of rp i need to purchase him (when i purchase the actual rp of course)

replies.body: We may be able to help!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)  or [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport)  so we can take a look.  I'm sure we can think of something!
